segments.text: Hello , Mr . Kramer . Could you spare a minute ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s about all I can spare , Karen . What do you need ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need to talk to you about that new secretary you ’ Ve hired . I think I ’ m going to have some problems working with her .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She seems to be quite qualified . If it ’ s a personal problem , I ’ d prefer it if you would work it out between yourselves .
segments.speaker: S2
